Academic and Technological Sources of Evera

Evera aligns digital person reconstruction with the Library of the Eternals, uniting peer-reviewed knowledge and an autonomous compute stack.

These partners anchor the Evera methodology and the OpenAI test environment before every model migrates into our sealed infrastructure.

Library of the Eternals Ethics & Safety How it works Book of Life For business

Academic institutions

Universities contribute archives, corpora, and philology that make each digital reconstruction verifiable. Their scholarship keeps the Library of the Eternals accountable and ethically grounded.

  • We use corpora and publications to verify quotes and context of the 'Eternals'.
  • Modeling relies on MIT AI & linguistics research.
  • Source of critical editions/translations for ancient 'Eternals'.
  • Used for reference validation and dictionaries.
  • A foundation for analytical psychology reconstructions.
  • Critical editions/monographs for context.
  • Linguistic and cultural sources.
  • Text corpora and stylistic analysis methods.
  • Key partner for Greek text variants.
  • Ethical and heritage frameworks.
  • Sources for Jung reconstructions.
  • Scholarly publications and critical texts.
  • Corpus data and linguistics.

Technological platforms

Technology partners supply compute, safety-first LLMs, and deployment tooling. OpenAI remains the test environment before every model is transferred into Evera’s autonomous stack.

  • Used as a bridge before full migration to Evera infra.
  • Rely on research on models & memory.
  • Apply safe-dialogue principles.
  • Test open models & pipelines.
  • Visual illustrations for dialogues.
  • Methods for quality/semantic eval.
  • Tooling & publications for ML workflows.
  • Reproducibility & privacy practices.
  • GPUs/accelerators for train/infer.
  • Infra for tests & artifact storage.
  • Store TMA users & events.
  • Hosting API/functions and static pages.
  • Edge cache & protection for speed.
  • Repos for methodology and build.
  • Interface & distribution of Evera dialogues.

Evera acknowledges these institutions and companies for their contribution to open science, cultural preservation, and AI research.

Evera unites academic rigor and computational precision — preserving the memory and mind of humanity.
